sap.fe.templates.RootContainer.controlle.!description:
Application developers should use this controller for the sap.fe.templates.RootContainer.view.Fcl view.

This controller and its associated view provide the entry point for your application when using the flexible column layout in SAP Fiori elements. When used, you should declare a sap.f.routing.Router as `router` in your application manifest.

extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.fe.templates.RootContainer.controller.Fcl with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.fe.templates.RootContainer.controller.RootContainerBaseController.extend}.
extend.!type: fn(sClassName: String, oClassInfo?: Object, FNMetaImpl?: fn()) -> fn()

parameters.oClassInfo: type: object, description: Object literal with information about the class
parameters.FNMetaImpl: type: function, description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to the metadata implementation used by this class
parameters.sClassName: type: string, description: Name of the class being created

sap.fe.templates.RootContainer.controlle.!description:
Application developers should use this controller for the sap.fe.templates.RootContainer.NavContainer.Fcl view.

This controller and its associated view provide the entry point for your application when using the classic full page layout in SAP Fiori elements. When used, you should declare a sap.m.routing.Router as `router` in your application manifest.

extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.fe.templates.RootContainer.controller.NavContainer with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.fe.templates.RootContainer.controller.RootContainerBaseController.extend}.
extend.!type: fn(sClassName: String, oClassInfo?: Object, FNMetaImpl?: fn()) -> fn()

parameters.oClassInfo: type: object, description: Object literal with information about the class
parameters.FNMetaImpl: type: function, description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to the metadata implementation used by this class
parameters.sClassName: type: string, description: Name of the class being created

sap.fe.templates.RootContainer.controlle.!helpDescription:
Application developers should use this controller for the sap.fe.templates.RootContainer.NavContainer.Fcl view.

sap.fe.templates.ListReport.ExtensionAPI.!description: Extension API for list reports on SAP Fiori elements for OData V4.
sap.fe.templates.ListReport.ExtensionAPI.!helpDescription: Extension API for list reports on SAP Fiori elements for OData V4.

refresh.!description: Refreshes the List Report. This method currently only supports triggering the search (by clicking on the GO button) in the List Report Filter Bar. It can be used to request the initial load or to refresh the currently shown data based on the filters entered by the user. Please note: The Promise is resolved once the search is triggered and not once the data is returned.

setFilterValues.!description: Set the filter values for the given property in the filterbar. The filter values can be either a single value or an array of values. Each filter value must be represented as a string corresponding to the given operator.
setFilterValues.!type: fn(sConditionPath: String, sOperator?: String, vValues: Array | String) -> Promise

parameters.vValues: type: Array|string, description: the values to be applied
parameters.sConditionPath: type: string, description: the path to the property as condition path
parameters.sOperator: type: string, description: the operator to be used (optional) - if not set, the default operator (EQ) will be used

sap.fe.templates.ExtensionAPI.editFlow.!description: ExtensionAPI that provides methods related to editFlow.

invokeAction.!description: Invokes a bound or unbound action.
invokeAction.!type: fn(sActionName: String, vContext: Array | sap.ui.model.odata.v4.Context, mParameters?: map) -> Promise

sap.fe.templates.ExtensionAPI.editFlow.!helpDescription: ExtensionAPI that provides methods related to editFlow.

securedExecution.!description: Secured execution of the given function. Ensures that the function is only executed when certain conditions are fulfilled.

sap.fe.templates.ObjectPage.ExtensionAPI.!description: Extension API for object pages on SAP Fiori elements for OData V4.

showSideContent.!description: Displays / Hides the Side Content of an Object Page Block.

parameters.bShow: type: boolean, description: Optional boolean flag to show / hide side content
parameters.sSubSectionKey: type: string, description: Key of the Side Content fragment as defined in manifest.json

sap.fe.templates.ObjectPage.ExtensionAPI.!helpDescription: Extension API for object pages on SAP Fiori elements for OData V4.

refresh.!description: Refreshes either the whole object page or only parts of it.

parameters.vPath: type: string|string[], description: Path or array of paths referring to entities or properties to be refreshed. If omitted, the whole object page is refreshed. The path "" refreshes the entity assigned to the object page without navigations

sap.fe.templates.ExtensionAPI.!description: Common Extension API for all pages of SAP Fiori elements for OData V4.

loadFragment.!description: Load a fragment and go through the template preprocessor with the current page context.

parameters.mSettings: type: object, description: The settings object

getModel.!description:
Get access to models managed by Fiori elements.
The following models can be accessed:
  • undefined: the undefined model returns the UI5 OData v4 model bound to this page
  • i18n / further data models defined in the manifest
  • ui: returns a UI5 JSON model containing UI information. Only the following properties are public, don't rely on any other property as it might change in the future
    • editMode: contains either 'Editable' or 'Display'
.

parameters.sModelName: type: string, description: Name of the model

addDependent.!description: Add any control as a dependent to this Fiori elements page.

parameters.oControl: type: sap.ui.core.Control, description: Control to be added as dependent

removeDependent.!description: Remove a dependent control from this Fiori elements page.

parameters.oControl: type: sap.ui.core.Control, description: Control to be added as dependent

sap.fe.templates.ExtensionAPI.!helpDescription: Common Extension API for all pages of SAP Fiori elements for OData V4.

parameters.sTarget: type: string, description: Name of the target route

updateAppState.!description: Triggers an update of the app state. Should be called if the state of a control, or any other state relevant information, was changed.
